pages.text: Sulfuric Acid is an extremely corrosive fluid. It can only be stored in a $(l:tfc:artisanal/drums)drum$(), not a barrel.
Sulfuric acid is made by blowing the fumes from hot $(thing)sulfur$() into a $(thing)water bottle$() with a $(thing)tuyere$().
Sulfuric acid can be used to pickle metal sheets.
